properties.areaDesc: Waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA extending from 20 nm to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 21 at 3:03AM EST until January 22 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 25 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 9 to 12 ft expected. For the Small
Craft Advisory, north winds 20 to 30 kt and seas 5 to 7 ft.

* WHERE...Savannah to Altamaha Sound from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM
EST Wednesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 1 PM EST
this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM EST WEDNESDAY
